channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 06:54 Driven anxiety in Donetsk Oblast.Creck on Further Messages.
item.description: 🟢 06:54 Driven anxiety in Donetsk Oblast.Creck on Further Messages.#Donetsk_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
